profile.name: Prof. Dr. Abdullatif Mohammed Al Shamsi
profile.text: An innovative visual program that hosts Emirati researchers and academics through a series of episodes and seasons of a scientific and knowledge nature that contribute to the delivery of scientific knowledge in an interesting and interesting manner. It deals with various concepts and topics such as climate, energy, cyber security and other strategic topics with the aim of spreading scientific knowledge among members of society of all categories and enriching Arab visual content in the field of science and knowledge.
